website_summaries.verdict: This waterproof unit offers multiple stylish color options and good Bluetooth range, making this a good option for use at the pool or other outdoor gatherings.
pros: The 12 hour battery life is adequate for extended use in outdoor home environments
Reliable wireless connection offers enough range to connect to an indoor device when outside
The waterproof exterior defends against pool splashes or unexpected rainstorms
Protective rubber coating is available in several stylish colors
A built-in microphone and speaker allows users to receive phone calls from a connected device
cons: While it includes the USB power bank like other Braven models, this unit is not as powerful as some and takes longer to charge devices

customer_reviews.title: This is how it arrives...
customer_reviews.text: It does not come in a box. It does not come with instructions. It does not come with the rubber cap to cover the ports. It doesn't come with anything but the speaker. I got on a chat for help about this product and Aria told me that this is how it comes, and if I want instructions, look it up on youtube. It doesn't come with the rubber cap to make it water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Can be shy about pairing with valid bluetooth devices, press and hold the 'play' key to solve
customer_reviews.text: This pairs well with my iPhone and works great! However, it is often 'shy' about pairing with other devices. After reading material on the Braven site I learned that by pressing and holding the "play" button I can force it to pair with a valid bluetooth device. Having done that once, that bluetooth device will now always recognize the Braven. I wish this information was in the box with the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: AlchemistGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, just like I expected
customer_reviews.text: What I like is that it is not that heavy, speakers are on both sides of the unit, battery life is long enough for me (8 hours+) and I can listen to my audiobooks in the shower with water hitting it and not having to worry. It also connects to bluetooth easily and the sound quality is still crisp when using the AUX. I bought it for my daughter (2) and I've taken it over. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: AUX hook up works great.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it to hook up to our film projector and have to use the AUX. I was worried it would not work for it but it does. Sound was louder than other speakers we have had. I didn't know it paired to other Braven speakers for a surround sound till I read the booklet. I was like yep gotta get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the price! Gets pretty loud, pairs up easily. Love the speaker! Power on/Off/Sync noises kinda loud. Wish you could turn that down.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruelaz

customer_reviews.title: great value for maximum sound
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this speaker!!!! I frequently use background tracks for work (as a voice coach), and this speaker has by far given me the best volume at a lower price than comparable products. Fun colors too! Just make sure you keep an eye on the charging lights on the back!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Robidoux

customer_reviews.title: Produces great sound and battery lasts awhile
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and take it with me everywhere. Produces great sound and battery lasts awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for such a little speaker. Charges fast and last over 8 hours. Stays connect for over 50’ without obstructions.
customer_reviews.author: john ujvary

customer_reviews.title: Mom is happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my MIL and she is very happy with it. She likes that the buttons are big and clearly marked. It has great volume and sound clarity. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just got my BRAVEN delivered... The product isn't working properly...
customer_reviews.author: selina calder

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased! I use it to send the signal to ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased! I use it to send the signal to a larger set of outdoor speakers when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound for a small speaker box , very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It plays great and sounds clear! Does not charge devices fully but great sound quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the research
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item at Sam's club and decided to check out Amazon. Found the color I wanted and the price was $30 cheaper. I love this speaker.... Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: It's not as loud but it small and good for me as a college student who is just ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as loud but it small and good for me as a college student who is just trying to get things done without much distraction.
customer_reviews.author: cash22

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: A very durable Bluetooth speaker with great sound! I'd recommend to everyone who is looking for a not so expensive Bluetooth speaker because it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really easy and eficient! Nice Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of this speaker and use them as a mini home theater for my room! just Great!
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Campos Gomes

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the sound quality is great. The delivery is earlier few days than is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a year and then just became a headache. Speaker connects and plays about 5 seconds then shuts off. You have to repeat the process over and over until you give up.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is fine, but
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is fine, but, seriously: include an AC adapter. Yes, I know, "everybody" has multiples of those, but they are not all rated to the same amperage and they get lost, left behind when traveling, broken, claimed ("No, you can't use that one, it's for my _____"). Just include one.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ketter

customer_reviews.title: Be aware.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker last year during prime day. Lasted 9 months. It no longer turns on, and before it stopped turning on it stopped connecting to Bluetooth, sound quality was great...over left something to be desired :(
customer_reviews.author: Joker

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for less that a year and barely have used it. It will not power up with charged battery. Crap!
customer_reviews.author: Meg1112

customer_reviews.title: Braven USB Charging Port CANNOT charge MOST cell phones or mp3 players... so what's it for then?
customer_reviews.text: Braven 705's USB out port CANNOT charge MOST cell phones and mp3 players. Page 11 of the manual. I just found out that my Braven 705 cannot charge my iPhone 5 or any of the several Android phones I own. Great sound but this sux. Very misleading and annoying. A pointless hole in my device that misled me when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Batchelor

product_meta.title: BRAVEN 705 Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker [12 Hours][Water Resistant] Built-in 1400 mAh Power Bank Charger - Purple
product_meta.description: Color:Purple| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLightweight portability meets big sound with the powerful Braven 705 Speaker. Custom high-fidelity audio drivers deliver room-filling sound to your music, media, conference calls and more. For a powerful, immersive left and right stereo experience, pair any two Braven 7-Series speakers together using Braven's highly-acclaimed TrueWireless Technology. Precision engineered with a shock-absorbent thermoplastic exterior and sleek finish, the Braven 705 Speaker is offered in a wide variety of colors to match your personal style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
